name: HAG-GIS
body:
### Welcome to HAG-GIS website.
The Historical Address Geocoder(HAG-GIS)is a Python package for automating the geocoding process for the [Digitising Scotland](http://www.lscs.ac.uk/projects/digitising-scotland/) project. The geocoding process will involve probability-matching historical records with contemporary addresses, designing an automating system to assist manual matching of historical addresses, and producing a small area geography from historical addresses. 

```
 A Beta version of HAG-GIS package will be available by the end of April 2015.
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
